response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a valuable asset. Given its worth to us, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its market value. We believe this price reflects the quality and benefits it brings to you. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 120}
